entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35104.04 #74270
  • empty string vs. null string #74126
    Backlog

Updated

  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3
  • Implement optimizations for constructing collections from collection literals #68785
    17.9
  • Allow `MemberNotNull` on constructors #71526
    Backlog
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull with multiple arguments #43906

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove double array allocation in SemanticTokens #74271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove (already disabled) command handlers related to 'add suppression' menu command. #74266
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
